meanings.definition: A website that allows collaborative editing of its content.
meanings.sent1: The wiki contained information about various animals that users could edit together.
meanings.sent2: I found a helpful wiki that explained how to fix my computer issue.
meanings.sent3: The wiki on funny cat videos had everyone laughing at the silly antics.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a wiki, constantly updating with new knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The wiki on gardening tips was a treasure trove of useful advice.

meanings.definition: A piece of software that allows users to create and edit web pages collaboratively.
meanings.sent1: Using the wiki, the team was able to work together on the project seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: I installed a wiki on my computer to help me organize my notes better.
meanings.sent3: The wiki software made website design feel like a fun group project.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed through the wiki software like a river of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The wiki tool revolutionized how we collaborated on writing assignments.

meanings.definition: A collaborative website that can be edited by multiple users.
meanings.sent1: The wiki platform allowed users to share their knowledge with others easily.
meanings.sent2: I contributed to a wiki about local history to help preserve our heritage.
meanings.sent3: The wiki community grew as more people joined to share their expertise.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite wiki was like a digital playground where she could explore new topics.
meanings.sent5: The wiki page on famous landmarks was a virtual tour around the world.
